channel.title: Depth First Search on ngld

item.title: Depth First Search
item.description: Depth First Search (DFS) # Definition # DFS used for traversing tree or graph. The backtracking is used for traversal. Travel from deepest node backtracks it parents. kinds of DFS in tree # Recursive (Time O(n), space O(n)) # Preorder (root, left, right) void preorder(struct Node* node){ if(node == nullptr) return; cout<<node->val(); preorder(node->left); preorder(node->right); } Inorder (left, root, right) void preorder(struct Node* node){ if(node == nullptr) return; preorder(node->left); cout<<node->val(); preorder(node->right); } Postorder (left,right, root) void preorder(struct Node* node){ if(node == nullptr) return; preorder(node->left); preorder(node->right); cout<<node->val(); } Iterative # preorder void iterativePreorder(TreeNode root){ if(root == nullptr) return; stack<TreeNode> st; TreeNode cur = root; st.
